summary: P2P Loan Protocol for NFTs - Build using the Arcade Protocol with the Arcade API Suite and developer tools. Borrow against your NFTs with fixed term oracleless loans, available for perpetual extensions. Unique Collateral & Assets including PFP Collections, Art, Real World Assets, and Gaming. Join the Arcade Community. Borrow and lend features with instant loans, collection offers, extension offers, and programmatic bids. Arcade.xyz API for technical teams. Secured by code with audits and integration with Arcade Protocol.
